channel.title: Software on Kirawat Sahasewiyon
channel.description: Recent content in Software on Kirawat Sahasewiyon

item.title: Affinity Photo
item.description: Affinity Photo Tutorials Batch Processing Batch convert multiple images to another file format by using Batch Job: File -> New Batch Job.... Pen to Selection Click on Selection button while in Pen mode. Crop from Selection Create an image file with just the selection by first Edit -> Copy image from the selection, then using File -> New From Clipboard command.
